title: As TV Viewers Get Older, Drug Ads Take A Terrifying Turn
teaser: With each passing day, fewer young people watch traditional television. As they turn to digital devices and other on-demand modes of getting entertainment, older Americans remain the dependable demographic for television. And that means older people are treated to a litany of drug ads, filled with lists of horrifying side effects.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
